Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Create new presentation
Add a new slide
Make selected text bold
Change the font size for selected text
Open the Zoom dialog box

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 剪切所选文字、对象或幻灯片
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Cut selected text, object, or slide

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 复制所选文字、对象或幻灯片
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Copy selected text, object, or slide

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 粘贴剪切或复制的文本、对象或幻灯片
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Paste cut or copied text, object, or slide
Undo the last action
Save the presentation
Insert a picture from your device
Insert a shape
Select a theme
Select a slide layout
Go to the next slide
Go to the previous slide
Go to the Home tab
Go to the Insert tab
Start the slide show
End the slide show
Close PowerPoint

Categories.ChineseCategoryName: 使用功能区选项卡的访问键
Categories.EnglishCategoryName: Use the Access keys for ribbon tabs

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 移动到功能区上的“搜索”字段，然后键入搜索词以查找帮助或帮助内容
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Move to the Tell me or Search field on the ribbon and type a search term for assistance or Help content
Open the File menu

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开“主页”选项卡并设置幻灯片、字体、段落或绘图的格式
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open the Home tab and format slides, fonts, paragraphs, or drawings

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开“插入”选项卡并插入幻灯片、表格、图像、插图、窗体、链接、文本、符号或媒体
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open the Insert tab and insert slides, tables, images, illustrations, forms, links, text, symbols, or media

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开“绘图”选项卡并访问绘图工具
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open the Draw tab and access the drawing tools

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开“设计”选项卡，应用主题并自定义幻灯片
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open the Design tab and apply themes and customize slides

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开“切换”选项卡，在幻灯片之间添加切换效果
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open the Transitions tab and add transitions between slides

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开“动画”选项卡，向幻灯片添加动画
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open the Animations tab and add animations to slides

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开“幻灯片放映”选项卡，设置和播放幻灯片放映
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open the Slide Show tab and set up and play the slide show

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开“审阅”选项卡，检查拼写和辅助功能并添加批注
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open the Review tab and check spelling and accessibility and add comments

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开“视图”选项卡和预览演示文稿布局、显示和隐藏网格线和参考线、设置缩放缩放、管理窗口和查看宏
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open the View tab and preview presentation layouts, show and hide gridlines and guides, set zoom magnification, manage windows, and view macros

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开“录制”选项卡，在演示文稿中管理屏幕录制、音频和视频
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open the Recording tab and manage screen recordings, audio, and video in your presentation

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开“帮助”选项卡并浏览 PowerPoint ，联系支持人员并留下反馈
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open the Help tab and browse the PowerPoint, contact support, and leave feedback

Categories.EnglishCategoryName: Work in the ribbon with the keyboard

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将焦点移动到功能区上的命令
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Move the focus to commands on the ribbon

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 在功能区上分别向下、向上、向左或向右在各项之间移动
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Move down, up, left, or right, respectively, among the items on the ribbon
Activate a selected button or control
Open the list for a selected command
Open the menu for a selected button
Expand or collapse the ribbon
Open a context menu

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 当主菜单处于打开或选中状态时，移到子菜单
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Move to the submenu when a main menu is open or selected

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 获取有关功能区上当前所选命令或控件的帮助
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Get help on the currently selected command or control on the ribbon

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 在“普通”视图中的窗格之间顺时针循环
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Cycle clockwise through panes in the Normal view

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 逆时针循环浏览“普通”视图中的窗格
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Cycle counterclockwise through panes in the Normal view

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 在“缩略图”窗格 和“大纲视图”窗格之间 切换
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Switch between the Thumbnail pane and the Outline View pane
Promote a paragraph
Demote a paragraph
Move selected paragraphs up
Move selected paragraphs down
Show level 1 headings
Expand text below a heading
Collapse text below a heading

Categories.ChineseCategoryName: 选择并编辑文本和对象
Categories.EnglishCategoryName: Select and edit text and objects

Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Select one character to the right
Select one character to the left
Select to the end of a word
Select to the beginning of a word

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 选择上一行（前提是光标位于行的开头）
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Select one line up (with the cursor at the beginning of a line)

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 选择下一行（前提是光标位于行的开头）
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Select one line down (with the cursor at the beginning of a line)

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 选择对象内的文本时，选择对象
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Select an object when the text inside the object is selected

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 选择一个对象时选择另一个对象
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Select another object when one object is selected

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将对象向后发送一个位置
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Send object back one position

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将对象向前发送一个位置
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Send object forward one position
Send object to back
Send object to front
Select text within an object (with an object selected)

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 选择幻灯片上的所有对象
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Select all objects on a slide
Play or pause media

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 在“幻灯片浏览”视图或缩略图窗格中选择所有幻灯片
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Select all slides in the Slide Sorter view or the thumbnail pane

Categories.ChineseCategoryName: 删除和复制文本和对象
Categories.EnglishCategoryName: Delete and copy text and objects

Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Delete one character to the left
Delete one word to the left
Delete one character to the right

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 在右侧位置删除(光标位于两个单词之间)
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Delete one word to the right (with the cursor between the words)

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 剪切选定的对象或文本
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Cut selected object or text

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 复制选定的对象或文本
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Copy selected object or text

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 粘贴剪切或复制的对象或文本
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Paste cut or copied object or text
Duplicate an object
Undo the last action
Redo the last action
Copy formatting only
Paste formatting only
Copy animation painter
Paste animation painter

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开“选择性粘贴”对话框
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open the Paste Special dialog box
